Package org.emrage.twitchbattleapi.database

Klasse DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
org.emrage.twitchbattleapi.database.DatabaseManager
public class DatabaseManager extends Object
Manages MongoDB database connections and operations

    • executeUpdate

      @Deprecated public boolean executeUpdate(String sql, Object... params)
      Veraltet.
      Use MongoDB native methods instead
      Execute SQL-style update (compatibility with old code)
      Parameter:
      sql - The SQL statement with placeholders (ignored)
      params - The parameters to replace the placeholders (ignored)
      Gibt zurück:
      Always false as SQL operations are not supported

    • executeQuery

      @Deprecated public List<org.bson.Document> executeQuery(String sql, Object... params)
      Veraltet.
      Use MongoDB native methods instead
      Execute SQL-style query (compatibility with old code)
      Parameter:
      sql - The SQL statement with placeholders (ignored)
      params - The parameters to replace the placeholders (ignored)
      Gibt zurück:
      An empty list as SQL operations are not supported

    • executeUpdate
